title: Zhengquan Cheng
text:
Dr. Cheng’s research interests lie in the fields of labor economics and behavioral economics, with a strong emphasis on integrating big data with economic theories to study individual decision-making.
He has published in journals including Journal of Economic Behavior & Organization, Finance Research Letters, and South China Journal of Economics (Chinese in 南方经济).

Education

Ph.D. in Labor Economics, Xiamen University
M.A. in Labor Economics, Southwestern University of Finance and Economics
B.A. in International Economics and Trade, China Jiliang University

title: Research
text:
Publications

Xiqian Cai, Zhengquan Cheng, Yang Jiao (2025). Skewed Aspirations: the Impact of Economic Inequality on Adolescent’s Cognitive and Non-cognitive Performance in Journal of Economic Behavior & Organization.[Link]
Xiqian Cai, Zhengquan Cheng, Dongxu Li (2024). Balancing against Geopolitical Risk: Household Investment Portfolios during the US-China Trade War in Finance Research Letters. [Link]
Zhengquan Cheng (2020). Does Exercise Habit Lead to Higher Income in South China Journal of Economics (Chinese in 南方经济).[Link]
